notes: They are weaker than [[Crystal Spider]]s but they come in masses. When they are killed they will shortly be replaced by another.
name: Frost Spider
behaviour: Frost Spiders chase their opponent and try to obstruct them from defeating their master, [[Zushuka]].
location: [[Ice Witch Temple]], second floor, in the centre when [[Zushuka]] has spawned.
strategy: There is no reason to kill Frost Spiders unless they are blocking your path to the ice pillar or the altar. You must kill [[Zushuka]] to stop the Frost Spiders from spawning. You can use [[Energy Wall Rune]]s to stop the Frost Spiders from blocking you while you destroy the pillars. For more, see the strategy of [[Zushuka]].
